#Text=Eight people found slain inside Houston-area home
#Text=Thursday , August 13 , 2015
#Text=Saturday night , police in Houston , Texas , United States , discovered eight people killed in a home .
#Text=Six of the victims were children .
#Text=Around 21:00 local time , Harris County Sheriff 's Office ( HSCO ) deputies arrived at the home on a welfare check .
#Text=After repeatedly trying to get someone to come to the door , officers forced their way into the house .
#Text=Here , police say , they were met by gunfire and a standoff ensued .
#Text=After upwards of an hour , with the house surrounded by special police units , the suspect was talked out of the house .
#Text=David Conley , 49 , was arrested by the HSCO and subsequently charged with the crimes .
#Text=Reportedly Conley had a lengthy history of violent behavior that landed him in prison multiple times .
#Text=His most recent stint behind bars came last month , when he was arrested for allegedly slamming his girlfriend 's head into a refrigerator in the same home involved on Saturday .
#Text=At the time of the murders , Conley was wanted on an assault charge against a family member .
#Text=All eight victims died at the scene .

#Text=On Sunday , authorities released the names and ages of the victims : Valerie Jackson , 40 , and Dwayne Jackson , her husband , 50 ; Nathaniel Jackson , 13 ; Honesty Jackson , 11 ; Dwayne Jackson , Jr. , 10 ; Caleb Jackson , 9 ; Trinity Jackson , 7 ; and Jonah Jackson , 6 .
#Text=Conley was the father of Nathaniel ( Nate ) Jackson .
#Text=Conley told investigators he used to live with Valerie Jackson and broke into the home after she had changed the locks .
#Text=" We 're here today on a very sad day , " said Tim Cannon , deputy chief of the HCSO .
#Text=" We 're here with our brothers in arms standing behind us because we 're all hurting .
